items.sentence: Tom and Mary are unlikely to do that by themselves.
I can\'t afford to shop at such an expensive store.
I can\'t believe that Tom made a mistake like that.
Tom said he thought Mary wouldn\'t want to do that.
Tom said he wanted to show what he\'d made to Mary.
Did you know Tom is pretty good at speaking French?
Tom wants you to call him back as soon as possible.
Tom was absolutely miserable when his dog ran away.
Tom was aware that the police were looking for him.
Tom never did anything Mary had to forgive him for.
